title: Bug 38131ajc needs -d option while correctly compiling classes from subpackage
OB: A directory "subpackage" is created under the existing "subpackage" directory.
EB: The class is compiled without creating an additional "subpackage" directory.
SR:
1. Create a class in a subpackage.
2. Compile using the command: ajc -d . subpackage\Test.java
